name: Whelp, Inc.
description: Developer of a customer messaging platform designed to offer omnichannel customer service. The company's platform unifies all existing traditional and modern customer support channels into one interface, enabling businesses to build a one-to-one approach to customer support and service resulting in increased sales.
one_liner: Developer of a customer messaging platform designed to offer omnichannel customer service. The company's platform unifies all existing traditional and modern customer support channels into one interface, enabling businesses to build a one-to-one approach to customer support and service resulting in increased sales.
